metadata.name: Recover the specified amount of funds from the specified DelayedWETH contract
metadata.description: This task calls the `recover` function in DelayedWETH to retrieve a specified amount of funds locked in a DelayedWETH contract. This task should be executed when the Superchain is paused OR when the respectedGameType has been changed to avoid ongoing games from funding the contract.

metadata.name: DelayedWETH.recover
metadata.description: Recover the specified amount of funds from the specified DelayedWETH contract
